definition: a drip/a little bit/intravenous drip (used to administer drugs)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
bit by bit/dribs and drabs/the little details/every aspect
to put sb on an intravenous drip
to put sb on an intravenous drip (Tw)

sentences.english: Remembering the past, I can not waste my youth any more.
sentences.chinese: 想想过去的点滴，觉得自己真的不能再浪费青春了。

sentences.english: An experimental method of applying the polarographic double-point determination to complexation titration was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出在络合滴定中应用极谱双点滴定的实验方法。

sentences.english: He left not a dreg in the glass.
sentences.chinese: 他把一杯水喝得点滴不剩。

sentences.english: He read all the interesting bit in the newspaper .
sentences.chinese: 他把报纸上点点滴滴有趣的新闻都读了。

sentences.english: But pediatricians do not consistently prescribe vitamin drops.
sentences.chinese: 但是儿科医生没有自始至终地开出维生素点滴的处方。

sentences.english: Fill with dry food, Daiyu San clear, accumulated bit by bit, and conditions are ripe.
sentences.chinese: 饱带干粮，晴带雨伞，点滴积累，水到渠成。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the curative effect of treating psoriasis guttate with tanshinone.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价丹参酮治疗点滴型银屑病的疗效。

sentences.english: Patients with guttate, erythrodermic, or pustular psoriasis were excluded.
sentences.chinese: 与点滴状，红皮，或脓疱性银屑病患者被排除在外。

sentences.english: It is one of the show's many pleasures that it revels in such indictments of extreme capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 这部剧集在点滴中都在透露着对极端资本主义的指控。

sentences.english: Praise the everyday as well as the exceptional.
sentences.chinese: 表扬特别的贡献，也要褒奖点滴的善举。

sentences.english: Or so is the reality the sun evaporated, a bit not left.
sentences.chinese: 抑或就这么被现实的烈阳蒸发掉了，点滴不剩。

sentences.english: For protecting a son, the Wei is graceful beautiful only bear with, even the intravenous drops all loathe to give up a dozen.
sentences.chinese: 为了保儿子，韦雅丽只有忍受，连点滴都舍不得打。

sentences.english: Stick with your plan and keep track of your progress.
sentences.chinese: 坚持计划，并记录进步的点点滴滴。

sentences.english: Throughout the day, you’re likely to find yourself drip-fed information by friends in your social stream.
sentences.chinese: 每天，你都能从你社交流中的朋友那里获得点滴信息。

sentences.english: This applies to everything in your life.
sentences.chinese: 这适用于你生活的点点滴滴。

definition: bit by bit/dribs and drabs/the little details/every aspect
sth small that one can find pleasure in (e.g. a cold beer after a hard day or a serendipitous find in a second-hand store)
